name: Cuisine Quest
description:
◆ The princess of the kingdom of Pretzelvania has been kidnapped and hidden away                in the Pizza  Castle! As a knight it is your task to rescue her using Pretzelvania's                special dishes which will grant you abilities.

◆ This game was made in five days for Dani's Basement Game Jam, the theme of the              jam was "You are what you consume".

◆ Credits:

      ✦ Programming: Miguel Serna & Diego Ruiz

      ✦ Art: Claudio Cerne

      ✦ Music: David Briffet & Mario Rivera
